md:
giải nghĩa từ "cuticles" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Cuticles (n) - Mô da (anatomy)
	+ Definition: The thin layer of dead skin cells at the base of the nail plate.
	+ Example sentence: "The beautician gently pushed back my cuticles to give my nails a clean shape."
	+ Related words: nail, skin, beauty, care.

* Cuticles (n) - Vỏ quả (botany)
	+ Definition: A thin, waxy or fatty layer on the surface of a fruit or leaf that helps to prevent water loss.
	+ Example sentence: "The cuticles on the apple skin help to keep it fresh for longer."
	+ Related words: fruit, leaf, plant, water.

Note: The word "cuticles" has different meanings depending on the context. In anatomy, it refers to the thin layer of dead skin cells at the base of the nail plate. In botany, it refers to the thin, waxy or fatty layer on the surface of a fruit or leaf.
